roles.title: Senior Full-stack Developer
responsibilities: Lead development of enterprise-level web applications using React, Next.js and Node.js
Architect database schemas and API endpoints for optimal performance and scalability
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews to ensure code quality
Collaborate with product managers to define technical requirements and project timelines

roles.title: Full-stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed RESTful APIs and backend services using Node.js and Express
Implemented responsive frontend interfaces with React and TypeScript
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways into applications
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning sessions

roles.title: Robotics Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed control systems for autonomous industrial robots using ROS and Python
Created web interfaces for robot monitoring and control using React and TypeScript
Implemented machine learning algorithms for obstacle detection and path planning
Collaborated with hardware engineers to integrate software with sensor systems

roles.title: Research Assistant - Robotics Lab
responsibilities: Assisted in research projects focused on autonomous navigation and robot perception
Implemented and tested computer vision algorithms for object recognition
Contributed to academic papers published in robotics conferences
Mentored undergraduate students on robotics projects
